document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palearctic (excluding north and Far East) ( Meregalli & Fremuth 2013 ).

Material examined.
130 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , ZMUM , IMC , SKC , YKC ) from 20 provinces were studied.
Dnipro Prov
. :
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Yekaterinoslav [=Dnipro]. B. Ilyin leg.,
15.v.1920
;

Donetsk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Horlivka , 1962
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novoazovsk Distr. , Samsonove , Khomutovskyi Step Nature Reserve, L. V . Kozlova ,
13.vi.1973
;
1 spec. ( SKC ) Torez ,
18.vi.2006
;
1 spec. ( SKC ) Torez ,
25.v.2006
;
Kharkiv Distr. : 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Velikyi Burluk Distr. , Nesterivka , V . Gorbunov leg.,
5.vi.1997
,
in
Marmota bobak
burrow; 1 spec. ( KUMN ) Izyum Distr. , Zavody , V . Vedmederya leg.,
18.v.1987
;

17.v.1997
;

.

Biology. Forest steppe. Adults occur in IV–X. Oligophagous on Asteraceae , namely
Centaurea
sp. ( Scherf 1964: 141 ) and
Leontodon saxatilis Lam. ( Dieckmann 1983: 319 )
.Larva inhabits in the root galls.
